title: Estonia at the 1932 Summer Olympics
text:
<a href="Estonia">Estonia</a> competed at the <a href="1932%20Summer%20Olympics">1932 Summer Olympics</a> in <a href="Los%20Angeles%2C%20California">Los Angeles</a>, <a href="United%20States">United States</a>.
The 1932 Estonian Olympic Team.
<a href="Estonian%20Olympic%20Committee">Estonian Olympic Committee</a> did not send a full team to those games due to financial problems and tried to recruit Estonians living in the United States. Most of them were not prepared to compete on a short notice, and only <a href="Alfred%20Maasik">Alfred Maasik</a> and <a href="Osvald%20K%C3%A4pp">Osvald Käpp</a> agreed.
Estonian National Olympic representative was professor <a href="Ants%20Piip">Ants Piip</a>. Estonian <a href="attach%C3%A9">attaché</a> was an <a href="electrical%20engineer">electrical engineer</a> <a href="Charles%20Kodil">Charles Kodil</a>.
Estonians in other delegations were <a href="Kalevi%20Kotkas">Kalevi Kotkas</a> for in athletics; <a href="August%20Lootus">August Lootus</a> was a reserve for in <a href="Sailing%20at%20the%201932%20Summer%20Olympics">sailing</a>; the <a href="1924%20Summer%20Olympics">1924 Summer Olympics</a> bronze medalist <a href="Aleksander%20Klumberg">Aleksander Klumberg</a> was an <a href="Athletics%20at%20the%201932%20Summer%20Olympics">athletics</a> coach for ; and <a href="Valter%20Palm">Valter Palm</a> was a <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201932%20Summer%20Olympics">boxing</a> coach for <a href="Finland%20at%20the%201932%20Summer%20Olympics">Finland</a>.
